    • Method Detail

      • isBundle

        public static boolean isBundle(File file)
        Checks whether the given file is a bundle or not. The check is based on the Bundle-ManifestVersion header. If the file is a directory this method checks if the directory is an exploded bundle. If the file is a jar file, it checks the manifest.
        Parameters:
        file - the file.
        Returns:
        true if it's a bundle, false otherwise.

      • isExplodedBundle

        private static boolean isExplodedBundle(File directory)

      • isFragment

        public static boolean isFragment(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
        Checks if a bundle is a fragment. It checks if the manifest contains the fragment host header.
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle to check
        Returns:
        true if the bundle is a fragment.
